item.title: December UQ Hacky Hour
item.dc:creator: SH
item.description:
The next Hacky Hour at St Lucia (The University of Queensland) will be on Tuesday, 1 December, from 4-5pm.

Give yourself an early Christmas present by coming down to St Lucy's cafe for a coffee with us.

You don't need to have a problem that needs solving â€” maybe you just want a break from your research.

Or you might want to know if anyone is working on a similar project to yours?

Maybe you just want to learn more about the tools other people are using?

Perhaps you'd like to hear more about what is coming up at the Feb 1-3 ResBaz in Brisbane next year?

If so, we are the people to ask!

-- Belinda and Sam
